edit_presentation.title: Proposed Presentation Title
edit_presentation.format_description: (Presentation Max 3 speakers; Panel Max 3 speakers 1 moderator;)
edit_presentation.general_topic: What is the general topic of the presentation?
edit_presentation.level: Select the technical level of your presentation content
edit_presentation.social_summary_desc: Used for social sharing and YouTube description.
edit_presentation.expected_learn: What should attendees expect to learn?
edit_presentation.attending_media: Are you available to discuss the topic of this presentation with attending media?
edit_presentation.links: PLEASE PROVIDE ANY RELEVANT LINKS TO ADDITIONAL INFORMATION, SUCH AS CODE REPOSITORIES, CASE STUDIES, PAPERS, BLOG POSTS ETC. (UP TO 5 LINKS)
edit_presentation.tag_max: Please select up to 8 tags that describe your presentation.
edit_presentation.tag_max_reached: You have selected the maximum number of tags.
edit_presentation.speaker: Speaker
edit_presentation.speaker_important: IMPORTANT! We have added new questions to the participant bio form. Please review the bios for all participants before submitting.
edit_presentation.speaker_note: Please Note: We have added new questions to the speaker bio form. Please review the bios for all speakers before submitting.
edit_presentation.enter_speaker: Enter the first name, last name or email address of the participant (*)
edit_presentation.speaker_declaimer: Participants agree that OpenStack Foundation may record and publish their talks presented during the Berlin OpenStack Summit. If you submit a proposal on behalf of a participant, you represent to OpenStack Foundation that you have the authority to submit the proposal on the participants’s behalf and agree to the recording and publication of their presentation.
edit_presentation.max_speakers: You have reached the maximum of participants.
edit_presentation.review_title: One Last Step - Confirm Your Submission
edit_presentation.review_important: Look over everything below to make sure it's to your liking. *IMPORTANT!* You MUST push 'CONFIRM MY SUBMISSION' to complete the process.
edit_presentation.no_edit: You are not allowed to edit this presentation

edit_profile.fill_speaker_details: You must complete your speaker profile in order to submit a presentation.
edit_profile.title: Title
edit_profile.affiliations_disclaimer: For our purposes, an affiliation is defined as any company where you are an officer, director or employee, or any person or company that has paid you more than $60,000 USD as an independent contractor in the last 12 months. Please list all affiliations which meet this criteria. If you're not being paid to work on OpenStack please put "Unaffiliated".
edit_profile.disclaimer_text: Speakers agree that OpenStack Foundation may record and publish their talks presented during the Berlin OpenStack Summit. If you submit a proposal on behalf of a speaker, you represent to OpenStack Foundation that you have the authority to submit the proposal on the speaker’s behalf and agree to the recording and publication of their presentation.
edit_profile.want_bureau: Want to be in the Speakers' Bureau?
edit_profile.want_bureau_text: In addition to the OpenStack Summit, we regularly recruit speakers for OpenStack community events around the world. If you would like to be considered for more speaking opportunities, please indicate your interest in being listed in the speaker’s bureau and complete the below questions so event organizers can learn more about you.
edit_profile.speaker_bureau: I'd like to be in the speaker bureau
edit_profile.video_conference: Willing to present via video conference
edit_profile.previous_links: Links To Previous Presentations ( Up to 5)
edit_profile.travel_restrictions: I do not have any travel restrictions and am willing to travel to any country
edit_profile.select_countries: Select individual countries that you are willing to travel to. If you do not check the box above AND do not select any countries, it will be assumed you are not willing to travel.
edit_profile.company_willing: My Company would be willing to fund my travel to events
edit_profile.org_role: What is your current Organizational Role at your company? (check all that apply):
edit_profile.opertating_os: Is your organization Operating an OpenStack cloud?
